website_summaries.verdict: Provides versatility and quality at a reasonable price – a solid choice that won't break your budget.
pros: Combines sturdy construction and spacious storage in a mid-sized unit
Made of hardwood with brushed nickel hardware
cons: Requires some drilling to connect plumbing

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this purchase. I unboxed and installed it yesterday and noticed many defects. I would think that a $700+ vanity would be of better quality. There are many cracks throughout the vanity, doors don't line up, drawers also don't line up to each other, etc. I gave it two starts due to the fact that it's all plywood instead of compressed board. Very disappointed. I've attached photos
customer_reviews.author: christt

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed at the quality and workmanship of this piece
customer_reviews.text: The vanity arrived in a timely manner and, upon inspection, I was amazed at the quality and workmanship of this piece. The packing was done so well and very secure. Everything looks great so far. When the bathroom remodel is finished, the vanity will be installed. The knobs are already on the drawers and are very pretty. The top is beautiful, a pure white quartz, and has to be secured when installed. I purchased two of the vanities, one 36" and one 43". I love them both.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R.

customer_reviews.title: great vanity
customer_reviews.text: Prior reviewer with a picture complained about a crooked door- you're supposed to fix that. You just loosen the screw and slide it straight. NBD. I watched my UPS guy tip it off the back of the truck. No surprise that the sink cracked. The company did send a replacement, by a real freight company, in a couple weeks. The color is a soft white. A creamy off white color. I love that this vanity is a right sink. We went from a tiny sink to this one and this allowed us to not have to move the plumbing. Its very hard to find a right offset sink. The vanity looks good. I think the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this vanity. It was delivered in perfect condition. Very well constructed and looks exactly as I had hoped. Soft white colored base with soft close doors and drawers with ample storage. The white quartz top, although a tad thin looks really quite nice. The Plummer that installed the faucet and vanity complimented as to how well made and good looking it is. Seriously, could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bathroom Vanity
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy unit and well built. Quality door / drawers and cabinets. it was very easy to do the final assembly of the counter top and the faucet fixtures. Had to make some slight modifications to the lower shelf and drawer to accommodate existing plumbing. Shipping was fast - as it arrived a day earlier than scheduled....and delivery driver helped store it in a workable location till I could unpack it. Only negative - the 3 drawers do not have even gaps from top to bottom. Hardly noticeable unless you are use to looking for faults like that.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well, ready to install, it’s a beautiful additional our new bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: Searched showrooms for a 36” bathroom vanity, for 3 weeks; never thinking to look or shop for one on Amazon. My husband is the one who suggested Amazon for one—my experience was fabulous! Amazon shipped and delivered in PRIME time. Love our new vanity.
customer_reviews.author: M McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Vanity! Works wonderfully with our new bathroom remodel.. Sink is very nice and deep same with drawers
customer_reviews.author: Angeleah

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have friends there to help you move it. It is heavy. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL J DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice piece of furniture. I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: LeighLeigh

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and is a higher grade then they show.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is unjust the product is much much better.
customer_reviews.author: Boyd Underwood Jr

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this vanity is really nice. The top is white cultured marble with a porcelain, under-mount sink. The vanity is painted a soft white and the drawers have good hardware. There was a problem with the first carrier but Amazon customer service was exceptional and ordered a replacement that arrived in a few days. That was impressive!
customer_reviews.author: T. Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful vanity. Well made, paint perfectly done. Delivery men were awesome and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in perfect condition! Looks great! Plenty of storage! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Vanity
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this vanity. Looks great. I have gotten many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: VICKI RUSSELL

customer_reviews.title: Vanity top not attached - No delivery notice
customer_reviews.text: The vanity comes packed well and is what we expected aesthetically, however the vanity top is not affixed. This is not expected and creates extra work. Additionally, the delivery was made with zero notice or scheduling. That is 100% unacceptable and reflects directly to the mfg. An uncoordinated delivery is a total fail, only redeemed by the fact that the unit looks good.
customer_reviews.author: DadOfFour

product_meta.title: Simpli Home Chelsea 36 inch Contemporary Bath Vanity in Soft White with White Engineered Quartz Marble Top
product_meta.description: Color:Soft WhiteYou are dreaming of that perfect bath vanity to complete your vision for the ultimate bathroom "spa". You want something stylish and functional. The 36 inch Chelsea Offset Bath Vanity has both. It is constructed with solid, hardwood frame and legs. Its contemporary look is our most popular and adds a luxurious feeling to your new contemporary bathroom. Matching mirror also available.; Efforts are made to reproduce accurate colors, variations in color may occur due to computer monitor and photography; Efforts are made to reproduce accurate colors, variations in color may occur due to computer monitor and photography
feature_bullets: Single sink bathroom vanity with 2 doors, 3 side drawers & 1 bottom drawer, hardwood frame and legs
Color: Off White with Brushed Nickel square knobs
Overall Vanity Size with Top: 37" w x 21.5" d x 34.5" h
105 degree hidden hinges and side mounted ball bearing drawer glides
White quartz marble top with under mounted rectangle 13" W x 18" L x 6.9" D vitreous china sink.; Three pre-drilled faucet holes for standard 4" center faucet; Faucet not included

specifications.Warranty Description: The product is warranted to be free from defects in material and workmanship for a period of
